nodes.text: S-K6 was a protocol droid that served the Sith Empire at the Imperial base camp on the planet Ilum during the Battle of Ilum in the Galactic War against the Galactic Republic.
S-K6 appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as the Imperial faction's Flashpoint Courier for the Flashpoint "The Battle of Ilum" in the Imperial base camp.
